description: Define how build mode should work in the session skill - executing plans checkpoint by checkpoint with verification and progress tracking

high_level: Execute finalized plans reliably with clear progress tracking
Enable pause/resume at any point without losing context
Capture learnings and deviations as implementation unfolds
mid_level: Checkpoint-as-Agent: Each checkpoint spawns a dedicated agent task with clean context
Progress Persistence: Update plan state after each task/checkpoint completion
DevNotes: Document implementation learnings, deviations, and decisions during build
User-in-Loop: Present results after each checkpoint for validation

key_decisions.decision: Spawn new agent task per checkpoint

key_decisions.rationale: Capture deviations and learnings from plan
Notes span task/checkpoint/session scope; structured for tooling
Can target session, checkpoint, or tranche explicitly
Simpler initial implementation; tranche-level can be added later

key_decisions.decision: Partial completion on errors (treat as pause)
key_decisions.rationale: Track exact position; resume picks up where stopped
Tests must pass by default; override creates DevNote
Follows Claude Code slash command conventions
